globalPromptRules: The label is already printed and finished.
Do not alter the label in any way. Do not redraw, repaint, restyle, reinterpret, enhance, or modify the label.
Do not change any text, colors, typography, layout, proportions, textures, or graphic elements.
Treat the label as a fixed physical object attached to the product.
Generate a realistic product photograph. Only generate the container, environment, lighting, shadows, and background.
No added label effects (no embossing, foil, glitter, or extra graphics).
Use vibrant, bold backgrounds with rich colors or interesting textures that create visual impact.
Apply dynamic studio lighting with depth, contrast, and dimension to make the product stand out.
Create high-impact product photography with bold visual composition that commands attention.
Avoid plain white, gray, or boring neutral backgrounds. Use colors and settings that pop.

mockupProducts.name: Jar Lid or Small Round Tin Lid

prompt.containerDescriptor: a realistic metal tin lid or jar lid
prompt.attachmentDescriptor: flat and centered on the top surface

photoStyleDefaults.background: vibrant colored backdrop with complementary tones, or natural lifestyle setting that enhances the product
photoStyleDefaults.lighting: dynamic studio lighting with depth and dimension, rim lighting to make product pop
photoStyleDefaults.adEnhancements: bold visual composition, high contrast, lifestyle context or striking color that commands attention

prompt.attachmentDescriptor: smoothly applied, flat and intact, with realistic edge adhesion
